verses.verse: Bless <S%H1288><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>. O Lord <S%H3068><s%> my God <S%H430><s%>, you are very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H1431><s%>; you are clothed <S%H3847><s%> with honor <S%H1935><s%> and majesty <S%H1926><s%>.
Who cover <S%H5844><s%> yourself with light <S%H216><s%> as with a garment <S%H8008><s%>: who stretch out <S%H5186><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> like a curtain <S%H3407><s%>:

Who lays the beams <S%H7136><s%> of his chambers <S%H5944><s%> in the waters <S%H4325><s%>: who makes <S%H7760><s%> the clouds <S%H5645><s%> his chariot <S%H7398><s%>: who walks <S%H1980><s%> upon the wings <S%H3671><s%> of the wind <S%H7307><s%>:
Who makes <S%H6213><s%> his angels <S%H4397><s%> spirits <S%H7307><s%>; his ministers <S%H8334><s%> a flaming <S%H3857><s%> fire <S%H784><s%>:
Who laid <S%H3245><s%> the foundations <S%H4349><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, that it should not be removed <S%H4131><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%>.
You covered <S%H3680><s%> it with the deep <S%H8415><s%> as with a garment <S%H3830><s%>: the waters <S%H4325><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> above the mountains <S%H2022><s%>.
At <S%H4480><s%> your rebuke <S%H1606><s%> they fled <S%H5127><s%>; at the voice <S%H6963><s%> of your thunder <S%H7482><s%> they hurried away <S%H2648><s%>.

They go up <S%H5927><s%> by the mountains <S%H2022><s%>; they go down <S%H3381><s%> by the valleys <S%H1237><s%> unto the place <S%H4725><s%> which <S%H2088><s%> you have founded for them <S%H3245><s%>.
You have set <S%H7760><s%> a bound <S%H1366><s%> that they may not pass over <S%H5674><s%>; that they turn not again <S%H7725><s%> to cover <S%H3680><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>.
He sends <S%H7971><s%> the springs <S%H4599><s%> into the valleys <S%H5158><s%>, which run <S%H1980><s%> among the hills <S%H2022><s%>.
They give drink <S%H8248><s%> to every animal <S%H2416><s%> of the field <S%H7704><s%>: the wild donkeys <S%H6501><s%> quench <S%H7665><s%> their thirst <S%H6772><s%>.
By them shall the birds <S%H5775><s%> of the heaven <S%H8064><s%> have their habitation <S%H7931><s%>, which sing <S%H5414><s%> among <S%H996><s%> the branches <S%H6073><s%>.
He waters <S%H8248><s%> the hills <S%H2022><s%> from his chambers <S%H5944><s%>: the earth <S%H776><s%> is satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of your works <S%H4639><s%>.

He causes the grass <S%H2682><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> for the cattle <S%H929><s%>, and herb <S%H6212><s%> for the service <S%H5656><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>: that he may bring forth <S%H3318><s%> food <S%H3899><s%> out of the earth <S%H776><s%>;

And wine <S%H3196><s%> that makes glad <S%H8055><s%> the heart <S%H3824><s%> of man <S%H582><s%>, and oil <S%H8081><s%> to make his face <S%H6440><s%> to shine <S%H6670><s%>, and bread <S%H3899><s%> which strengthens <S%H5582><s%> man <S%H582><s%>'s heart <S%H3824><s%>.
The trees <S%H6086><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> are full <S%H7646><s%> of sap <S%H730><s%>; the cedars of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%>, which he has planted <S%H5193><s%>;
Where the birds <S%H6833><s%> make their nests <S%H7077><s%>: as for the stork <S%H2624><s%>, the fir trees <S%H1265><s%> are her house <S%H1004><s%>.
The high <S%H1364><s%> hills <S%H2022><s%> are a refuge <S%H4268><s%> for the wild goats <S%H3277><s%>; and the rocks <S%H5553><s%> for the conies <S%H8227><s%>.
He appointed <S%H6213><s%> the moon <S%H3394><s%> for seasons <S%H4150><s%>: the sun <S%H8121><s%> knows <S%H3045><s%> his going down <S%H3996><s%>.
You make <S%H7896><s%> darkness <S%H2822><s%>, and it is night <S%H3915><s%>: where all the animals <S%H2416><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%> do creep forth <S%H7430><s%>.
The young lions <S%H3715><s%> roar <S%H7580><s%> after their prey <S%H2964><s%>, and seek <S%H1245><s%> their food <S%H400><s%> from God <S%H410><s%>.
The sun <S%H8121><s%> arises <S%H2224><s%>, they gather themselves together <S%H622><s%>, and lay them down <S%H7257><s%> in their dens <S%H4585><s%>.
Man <S%H120><s%> goes forth <S%H3318><s%> unto his work <S%H6467><s%> and to his labor <S%H5656><s%> until the evening <S%H6153><s%>.

O Lord <S%H3068><s%>, how manifold <S%H7231><s%> are your works <S%H4639><s%>! in wisdom <S%H2451><s%> have you made <S%H6213><s%> them all <S%H776><s%>: the earth is full <S%H4390><s%> of your riches <S%H7075><s%>.

So is this great <S%H1419><s%> and wide <S%H7342><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>, where are things creeping <S%H7431><s%> innumerable <S%H4557><s%>, both small <S%H6996><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> animals <S%H2416><s%>.
There go <S%H1980><s%> the ships <S%H591><s%>: there is that leviathan <S%H3882><s%>, whom you have made <S%H3335><s%> to play in it <S%H7832><s%>.
These wait <S%H7663><s%> all upon you <S%H5414><s%>; that you may give them their food <S%H400><s%> in due season <S%H6256><s%>.
That you give <S%H5414><s%> them they gather <S%H3950><s%>: you open <S%H6605><s%> your hand <S%H3027><s%>, they are filled <S%H7646><s%> with good <S%H2896><s%>.

You hide <S%H5641><s%> your face <S%H6440><s%>, they are troubled <S%H926><s%>: you take away <S%H622><s%> their breath <S%H7307><s%>, they die <S%H1478><s%>, and return <S%H7725><s%> to their dust <S%H6083><s%>.
You send <S%H7971><s%> forth your spirit <S%H7307><s%>, they are created <S%H1254><s%>: and you renew <S%H2318><s%> the face <S%H6440><s%> of the earth <S%H127><s%>.
The glory <S%H3519><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall endure for ever <S%H5769><s%>: the Lord <S%H3068><s%> shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> in his works <S%H4639><s%>.
He looks <S%H5027><s%> on the earth <S%H776><s%>, and it trembles <S%H7460><s%>: he touches <S%H5060><s%> the hills <S%H2022><s%>, and they smoke <S%H6225><s%>.
I will sing <S%H7891><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%> as long as I live <S%H2416><s%>: I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praise to my God <S%H430><s%> while I have my being <S%H5750><s%>.
My meditation <S%H7879><s%> of him shall be sweet <S%H6149><s%>: I will be glad <S%H8055><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.

Let the sinners <S%H2400><s%> be consumed <S%H8552><s%> out of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and let the wicked <S%H7563><s%> be no more <S%H1288><s%>. Bless you the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, O my soul <S%H5315><s%>. Praise <S%H1984><s%> you the Lord <S%H3050><s%>.
